title: Wire up tick-board with API data and column rendering
description:
Update tick-board.ts to:
1. Fetch ticks on connectedCallback using fetchTicks()
2. Group ticks into columns by status:
   - blocked: ticks with blockers
   - ready: open ticks without blockers, not in progress
   - in-progress: ticks with 'in-progress' label or status
   - review: ticks awaiting review
   - done: closed ticks
3. Apply search filter (title, description match)
4. Apply epic filter (parent matches selected epic)
5. Render 5 tick-column components with filtered ticks
6. Handle tick-selected event to set selected tick
7. Handle header events for search/filter changes

Test: Load board with real API, verify ticks appear in correct columns
acceptance_criteria: Board loads ticks from API, columns show correct ticks, search/epic filters work, selecting tick updates state
